title: Converting to Standard Notation
text: To convert a number in scientific notation to standard notation, simply reverse the process. Move the decimal $$n$$ places to the right if $$n$$ is positive or $$n$$ places to the left if $$n$$ is negative and add zeros as needed. Remember, if $$n$$ is positive, the value of the number is greater than $$1$$, and if $$n$$ is negative, the value of the number is less than one.
speech: To convert a number in scientific notation to standard notation, simply reverse the process. Move the decimal  n  places to the right if  n  is positive or  n  places to the left if  n  is negative and add zeros as needed. Remember, if  n  is positive, the value of the number is greater than  1 , and if  n  is negative, the value of the number is less than one.

title: Moving the Decimal
